description: Suou Ginta is Miki`s best male friend and a member of the Toryo tennis team. Miki has had a crush on him since junior high and confessed her feelings to Ginta in a note. However, the note was found by Ginta`s classmates, and Ginta downplayed it, without knowing at the time that she was watching, although he felt the same way about Miki.
name: Suou Ginta
